title: Life As We Knew It
description: Alternate cover for this ASIN can be found hereChaos changes everything! Shane Delaney, a burned-out mercenary with a troubled past, returns home to small-town Kansas to heal his scars and quiet his demons, not planning to stay long enough for the townsfolk to reject who he has become. He never expected the town to need his deadlier skills. When a terrorist attack on distant cities abruptly transforms life as they knew it, the people of Emmaus must forge their own disaster plan to survive. What would you do if the world as you know it ended today? The people of Emmaus will find out.
author: Lela Markham
